name: The Pacman
description:
The Pacman:

This game is designed to be a clone of Pacman that has its mechanics and dynamics but has our own aesthetics. We chose to make a style that reflects more of an adventure game with the player being an explorer with a hat similar to Indiana Jones's, with a dungeon-esque level design, and with other art along these lines.

The game was made by Edward, Guss, Noah, and Alex.

Our roles:

Edward Tavarez: Programming

Augusto Llamas: Level Design 

Noah Goyette: Character Animator and Design

Alex Hoffman: Asset/UI Design
